item.title: First students evacuated from Gaza to study in UK
item.description: The group includes at least four medical doctors who have places to study at UK universities.

item.title: Estonia condemns 'brazen' airspace violation by Russian warplanes
item.description: Tallinn says three Russian MiG-31 fighter jets remained in Estonian airspace for 12 minutes.

item.title: British couple freed by Taliban hug daughter in emotional reunion
item.description: Barbie, 76, and Peter Reynolds, 80, arrive in Qatar after being detained in Afghanistan for months.

item.title: Drone strike on Sudan mosque kills 78, medic tells BBC
item.description: Local activists and residents describe the early morning attack on worshippers.

item.title: Minister rejects Trump's call for military to tackle illegal migration
item.description: US President Donald Trump suggested the military could help tackle illegal migration to the UK.
